website_summaries.verdict: Since this heater derives its heat from the sun, only the pump needs power, making this a low-energy choice.
pros: An expandable solar panel set that can be installed on a nearby rooftop or on the ground beside the pool
One set can support a 16,000-gallon pool
Connecting additional solar panel sets for more heating power is easy
cons: Small leaks may develop in the solar panels over time

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: installation instructions are weak, so here are some pictures of what I did with some Homedepot help.
customer_reviews.author: AMA

customer_reviews.title: Product works. Check valve and instructions not very good
customer_reviews.text: Heats the pool nicely. I have a 16k gallon pool. Noticable difference within a few days. Instructions aren't as descriptive as they should be. I plumbed 1 1/2" from my filter up to the collectors and back. This created a pressure/flow problem. A week later, tore it all out and replaced with 2". Problem fixed. The check valve that came with the kit was defective. Check all parts for working order before installing. I get a 10 psi rise when I route the water through the collectors. System running good with a 1 1/2 hp pump
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: NO clear instructions. Lasted one season and sprung tiny leaks
customer_reviews.text: The instructions that come with this package are wrong. I had to research several sites until I found a video that shows how to properly hook up both panels. I unpacked the panels from storage and set them up today. When I started testing with the pool pump I found multiple tiny leaks. The end caps are useless and I cannot get the ends to stop leaking. Waste of $$
customer_reviews.author: Ameet Jayawant

customer_reviews.title: Solar pool heater kit
customer_reviews.text: I can’t give an engineer’s report but I will say this works. My husband is a plumber so the installation was doable. He added a valve here and there and rerouted a pipe or two to accommodate our system but we felt it made a difference. We recently had a new liner or our 18 x 36 inground pool. We chose a dark blue color to increase sun absorption then we purchased one of these kits and turned off the gas heater. We were happy with the increase of degrees. Pool temp range was in the mid eighties and low 90s during this year’s hot summer. We will probably add another kit next year to extend the season.
customer_reviews.author: Home Grown Tomatoes

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase for me
customer_reviews.text: We bought a total of 8 panels for a pool of size 20f by 40f. We live in Northern Mississippi and get adequate sunshine in this area. While the pool’s jets indicate that lukewarm water does come out, it is not profoundly warm enough. The pool still feels slightly chilly. It is the end of May now and I fear that the system will be totally useless by October.
customer_reviews.author: Ticonderoga

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: For the amount I paid for these units initially 4 in would think they would last a while. I already replaced 1 last year leaks to numerous to fix was easier to replace. Then this year replaced 2 more of the units and 1 is already leaking... so before anyone ask I am a master plumber who works on many pools at the US NAVAL ACADEMY and I am very familiar with winterizing. Product worked great the first summer. Down hill quickly after that. Ps. Going home tonight to fix another leak
customer_reviews.author: robert whitley

customer_reviews.title: Has a hole in it on upon plumbing it in.
customer_reviews.text: Not overly hard to install. I wasnt expecting to just unpack and hook up. Its not a diy job for someone with no plumbing experience. Got everything plumbed in and hooked up. Turned on pump and one of the collectors had a hole in it. Box came barely taped together. Looked like a returned product. Takes two ppl to unspool collectors. For $200 a pop it kinds of sucks there is a hole in one of the panels. So ill have to tear it all back down to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Not Really What I Expected!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these - wasted a lot of time and money. When the pump first starts the water feels warm. That lasts about a minute then it runs cold. It did raise the pool water temperature 2 degrees during the day, but I was expecting more. This is a great idea, just didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. ProvinceTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Warm Pool
customer_reviews.text: Figure out how to secure these to the roof or find somewhere else sunny to put them. They are amazing! I rigged my water supply from the pool pump using a variable valve and garden hoses, garden timer, etc. I have 3 sets on the roof that heat my 25,000 gallon pool nicely. Make sure to balance your cyanuric acid level or the heat will eat your chlorine faster than you can add it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Birtwhistle

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than a heater...
customer_reviews.text: Description said 2 4x20 panels but it was 4 2x20 panels...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fragile panels
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this heater kit last year and it worked fine last summer. When I opened my pool this year and hooked up my heater one of the panels began leaking, given it was a 1 year warranty I am screwed. Not the best situation.
customer_reviews.author: richard ennis

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Higky recommenced... ❤️ We got this to replace our solar system for the pool after checking all the reviews.. It arrived in a timely manner. We have it up and running through our old system and the water in the pool is nice and warm... it works really well. I hope it stays working like it has been ... will rewrite the view if there is any issues but we love it...
customer_reviews.author: RITA SINGH

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My husband swears it has heated the pool by 5-7 degrees.. wants me to buy another set. So i will definitely be buying this again. Make sure you buy the additional installation kit. I didn't and after pricing everything separately and trying to find the right valves. He said cheaper to buy it here. Very good quality. Installed in 1 day. He is very happy
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: NO HEAT
customer_reviews.text: WATER GOES RIGHT THROUGH THE MAIN TUBE AND DOES NOT GO THROUGH THE PANEL AS IT SHOULD. NOT HAPPY AND SENDING BACK.
customer_reviews.author: KEL

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product and quality. Works Perfectly here in Michigan summers, keeps are pool in the 80’s. Will be adding another panel kit this summer. Our pool is in ground, 18x30
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Clips are a bad idea
customer_reviews.text: These work well, but I've developed leaks and it is an installation issue. On a pitched roof their clips will eventually cut through a tube. Ideally they wouldn't touch, but in reality they will. Next time I would use their clips outside of the tube field and run the straps across the panels to keep them from blowing away. On a flat roof I doubt this would be an issue, and it gives the advantage to the collectors that run from top to bottom instead of side to side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Have had it on my roof for three summers now. Only had two minor leaks in three years caused by birds. Easley fixed. It has help increase the temperature by 3 to 6 degrees on sunny days. You can really feel the heat coming out of the discharge. It has been doing great with my 27000 gallon inground pool
customer_reviews.author: Ian Phillipps

customer_reviews.title: developed massive leak after less than one year
customer_reviews.text: connectors disintegrated, panel developed massive leak by July of 2019. purchased in July 2018.
customer_reviews.author: Meri A. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Installation instructions ARE included
customer_reviews.text: I will update this review after installation but wanted to note that it does come with installation instructions and rubber hose connectors hose clamps and strap mounting hardware for the panels
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I had to beef up my pump but was time anyway. Went from 1 HP single speed to 1.85 HP variable speed bc the 1HP wouldn’t prime while connected to the solar panels (a bit farther than the 30’ and one story that the Solar instructions say a 1 HP should handle). Heating is great. We reached last years max temp by early June.
customer_reviews.author: J.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Second set purchased and work great!
customer_reviews.text: Ruggedly made! Where I thought was a problem was nothing! Heats the waterup beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: cm

customer_reviews.title: Pool is much warmer
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Pool is covered with too much shade from trees, and even late summer was too cool for me. This summer it's not even June and the pool is in the mid-80s. I planned to buy another set in the fall to try and keep the pool open longer (unless I don't need it - will wait and see).
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Chin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Looked exactly as it did in the ad. Everything in one box and ready to assemble. Installed w/o any problems, though I used pvc for the in and out flows. It raised the temp a few degrees but it is an inground pool with a 9ft deep end. I did put a shut off valve in line to control the flow the as to be able to regulate the temperature better.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: They seem well made but I was suppressed that not ...
customer_reviews.text: They seem well made but I was suppressed that not having them lay on my roof would reduce the heat they provide so much. I get about 3 to 4 degrees increase in temp since they are not sitting against my roof but on top of a pergola.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: 2/8 Defective
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the 8 panels I bought were defective with leaks at the header pipes. Same location on both.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A

customer_reviews.title: Works really well.
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these connected to my 15' X 30' pool and they heat up my pool 3 - 4 degrees on a sunny day. According to the math I am still short by 1 but the 3 that I have work perfect for me. I live in South Florida so I get plenty of sun and don't need as much as they recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aesco42

customer_reviews.title: Works well for 500 sqf pool
customer_reviews.text: Even though they say that it is too small for my pool size it raises pool temperature to 28C. It definitely extended swimming season!
customer_reviews.author: Galant

customer_reviews.title: Leaked when installed.
customer_reviews.text: It took a while to get it installed. By the time we got it installed and turned it on it leaked. We did the recommended fix which worked. Hoping it warms the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Night swims are fun again
customer_reviews.text: Never loved the pool more since putting six of these on the roof.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dean Gervase

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised to read so many negative reviews. Installed this myself and have had no issues through 3 Florida summers.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun F.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived without connections
customer_reviews.text: I've used in the past but this product came without connections and we have to send the entire box back to get the connectors...?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good panels, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the same four panels on my roof that were dry rotted (installed 2006) They work very well and i was able to replace all four in a couple hours. They come rolled up in a box so you have to lay them in the sun for awhile to get them to straighten out before install. I used pool chairs to hold the end down while waiting for the sun to relax them. The instructions say don't lay them in your grass while doing so. I replaced existing panels so it was easier than installing everything from scratch.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID N.

customer_reviews.title: panel size is 2 - 2'x20'
customer_reviews.text: panels have just arrived and it is not 1-4' x 20' panel, it is 2- 2'x20' panels. We will need to have about 4" more space between the panels.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gautreaux

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: after 6 months, they started leaking, replace the parts but still have leaking issues.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta H.

customer_reviews.title: pipe is not 2 inch
customer_reviews.text: fittings are 1-1/2 inch, not 2 inch that is described in specifications.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been very pleased with this. He's been able to bring the temp up about 3 degrees by just running this for a day.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Four panels (two kits) heat the pool five or six degrees, which is allowing us to swim year round.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Time
customer_reviews.text: At what time should the water in my 16,000 gallon pool feel warm?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing rubber end caps
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the rubber end caps are not included and not even mentioned as item to purchase before installation. I couldn't start the pump running for another 10 days until the caps came.
customer_reviews.author: Pxelk

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I live in south Florida so we get a lot of sun. This product gave us earlier swim time in April and will extend our swim time in October. We got 4 degrees in the first week we installed it.
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: I need help to work it.
customer_reviews.text: I've opened it since early Aug with smart solar heater on the roof and water fall in pool. As water flows fast, it doens't seem to have enough time to be heated on the roof. How can I adjust the flow so that solar heater is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We have a 15x30 foot in ground pool and these ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a 15x30 foot in ground pool and these solar heaters worked perfectly. Just upset that I didn't buy and installed them sooner. Just a heads up, I have no experience working with PVC pipes but the instructions are straight forward. You just need an extra pair of hands.
customer_reviews.author: Riad M.

customer_reviews.title: HOT water
customer_reviews.text: Wow! It really works!! I live in Tampa FL and bought 2 of these. It took me an afternoon to install/add plumbing to my current system. Now my pool is at least 10 degrees warmer! The water coming out of the jet feels much warmer than the pool, especially when the sun is out. This should add 2-3 months to our swimming. It was a bit of work getting it installed, but well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Vacuumdad

customer_reviews.title: angle that is not perfect for direct sun
customer_reviews.text: bought 2 kits, angle that is not perfect for direct sun, but 45* angle in winter sun in FL. getting about 2* rise per day , 14K gal pool, lil slower then i thought it would take, but what the heck, FREE heat, some cool fronts and clouds didnt help, but wont swin in that weather anyway.
customer_reviews.author: joe walsh

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: item came with holes in part of the heater....had to plug them with epoxy
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We received our order as scheduled with no problems. Couldn't have asked for more.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Clark

customer_reviews.title: OK, Seen to be adequate.  Not large enough?
customer_reviews.text: Well, my old solar panels sprung leaks, and could not be plugged. I tried to order similar size and brand, but they all have been replaced with these smaller size units. They may be easier to handle, but they are much smaller and you need more space to get the same surface area. I'm trying out various configurations to get better heat out of just 2 units, by enclosing the units in an insulated greenhouse type box. I'll let you know how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Skeeter Hater

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, I live in California, 60m north of San Diego, the pool volume is 15k, I've placed 2 units, flat on the ground, I didn't care about the orientation, the temps: with a blanket 88, w/out 83
customer_reviews.author: Roman Zielinski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far it's awesome. Less than a year though so hopefully the other reviews won't come true
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann C. Sabino

customer_reviews.title: i suspect making it more formal with temp sensors and timers would be better, but the quality is good
customer_reviews.text: a little expensive. i do find that the two (photo shows four) does increase the pool temp, i did not measure the temp, but they work. i placed them on a timer, the timer is a cheap one, 15 minutes on then 15 off. the water feels warm. i suspect making it more formal with temp sensors and timers would be better, but the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: big_truck_guy

customer_reviews.title: Solar pool heater
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well but it didn't give me quite as much heat as I had wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Keys

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As advertised - worked great to warm up our above ground pool.
customer_reviews.author: A G. for you

customer_reviews.title: The install parts are a waste, plan on buying your own fittings at your ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 panels for a 10K gallon pool. It seems to warm the pool a few degrees, not near the level I expected. The install parts are a waste, plan on buying your own fittings at your local hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Stevo

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My brother and I installed it in a few hours. Over the past week or so the water temperature in my pool has risen considerably, to right where we want it. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Bush

customer_reviews.title: Great heaters not even using gas heater
customer_reviews.text: Great heaters I bought 2 for a 20x40 pool only had space to install 3 of the 4 panels works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WORKS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for a pool 20 X 40 inground. This system really works. We have it laying on a hill in the sunlight. You can feel the hot water come through the jets when you stand in front of them in the pool. We had a 10 degree raise in pool water. We bought 2 boxes and it does warm the water.
customer_reviews.author: good buys

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: We installed the solar panel to help bump up the temperature of our in-ground pool. It is working very well and doing just what we had hoped. Very happy we purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: not as good as the heater we had before
customer_reviews.text: not as good as the heater we had before. Doesn't raise pool water as much as I would have expected.
customer_reviews.author: wil330

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Was worried about the build quality but ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Was worried about the build quality but pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: swimmer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: One of the water cells was ripped could not use one section basically half of the product was on usable
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hufnagel

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend these heaters for the pool
customer_reviews.text: highly recommend these heaters for the pool. I've been using them for over 12 years now and if you want to use the pool longer this is the trick. I am able to get in the pool from April and use it through late October and some time into November, also using a solar blanket at night to keep the heat in. it will keep the pool heated to the lower 90s and mid 80s as long as the sun is on it, of course the panels are mounted on my roof and I use 4 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The heater exceded my expectations we are in the tropics but the improved temperaturature is as advertized, pretty soon I will be ordering aditional unit to increase even more the temperature
customer_reviews.author: Julio Z Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Used this for a 14000 gallon in ground pool but ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a 14000 gallon in ground pool but I think it puts too much of a drain on my pump.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. I installed this product and the water coming out is the same temperature as the water going in. My fingers are crossed that when the weather gets a lot hotter it does raise the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: 29dresses

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Our pool has been installed since first week of August in north central ohio. Pool temp hangs around 80 - 84 using solar heaters mounted on garage roof and covering with solar blanket every day. Friends down the road said their pool never got over 70 this year. I think these solar heaters work great although instructions on how to mount with brackets they send you would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Omegatmk

product_meta.title: Smartpool S601P SunHeater Solar Heating System for In Ground Pool
product_meta.description: Smart pool Sun Heater High Density 4'x20' (80 sq. ft.) Solar Heater for In Ground Pools can be mounted on roof.
feature_bullets: Keep your pool warm with a polypropylene heat collector. Direct Flow System - One Header Hole for Each Heating Tube
Solar heater features 80 square feet of solar panels
Pool accessory is perfect for heating any in-ground swimming pool
Panel array measures 4 feet wide x 20 feet long. Raises Pool Water Temperature 6-10°F (4-6°C)

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars138 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
